text: @JoeBiden @WhirledCitizen_ Americans the economy is a reflection of the United States sadly being #1 in DEATHS & INFECTIONS. You only get to #1 in this case from Incompetence & mishandling of the Coronavirus at the level of someone who is a glorified,overweight salesman masquerading as a Partime President.
